title: Greener Goddess Dressing Recipe
full_text:
Greener Goddess Dressing Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
5 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
4 servings
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1/2
cup
mayonnaise
1/2
cup
sour cream
1/2
Hass avocado
, roughly chopped
2
medium
scallions
, trimmed and quartered
1
large
garlic clove
2
anchovy fillets
24
leaves
tarragon
12
leaves
basil
The
juice
of
3/4
lemon
Kosher salt
, to taste
Freshly
cracked black pepper
, to taste
Directions
Put everything in the blender, and whiz on full blast until completely smooth. Serve over an iceberg wedge, with crudités, with shrimp cocktail, or with anything you want.
Salad Dressing
